price: Suka ce: "Sakamakonsa, wanda aka same shi a cikin kãyansa, to, shi ne sakamakonsa,* kamar wancan ne muke sãka wa azzãlumai."
arabic: قَالُواْ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Shari'ar Banĩ yã'aƙũbu ita ce anã bautar da ɓarãwõ shekara guda. Wannan shĩ ne shari'ar da Tũrãwa suka ɗauka suka mayar da ita ɗaurin kurkuku da bautar da ɓarãwo a cikin mudda ayyananna.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū jazāuhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazāuhu kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
